website_summaries.verdict: While some offer better, longer-lasting results, it's hard to pass up these affordable, well-rounded strips if you're shopping on a budget.
pros: Stands out for their easy application and enamel-safe ingredients
cons: The whitening gel can separate from the strip, which not only causes a mess but can also make some strips unusable

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot of strips over the years, these are not the worst but definitely not the best. The top ones stay on fine, the bottom ones do not stick or stay in place. My husband had the same issue with them so it is not user error. They just do not want to stay in place or “form to your teeth”. Wouldn’t buy again because of this reason.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Although these white strips are cheap I would not recommend buying. More than half the pack of white ...
customer_reviews.text: Although these white strips are cheap I would not recommend buying. More than half the pack of white strips where stuck to the plastic. I was unable to pull them off of the packaging to put onto teeth. The other half that I was able to apply did not whiten the teeth it only left them spotted with random specks of white that would typically wear away within a day. I would recommend splurging for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Megan W

customer_reviews.title: Leaves yucky residue
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED>>>> Oct 5th. While I do hate the goo left on your teeth. They did bleach my teeth a bit. So yup....I decided to buy them again!!! It did not make my teeth sensitive like many others do from what I read. SO I will deal with goo! Initial review>>>The goo sticks to your teeth after you remove he strips....absolutely disgusting. I thought these were ones a friend gave me. These barely stick to your teeth at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kirasheba

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome and do a much better job than most of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and do a much better job than most of the over the counter kits you can buy in the store. I have noticed immediate results and am very happy with this product. Another positive is that the customer support is phenomenal. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for a great product and a great company that cares about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Jake B.

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw - bottom strip too short.
customer_reviews.text: I do love the whitening results. Better results than any other brand I've tried. Having said that,. WHY doesn't anyone make the bottom strip at least as wide as the top strip??? Sorry, but people look pretty stupid with a few white teeth in the bottom front, then yellow the rest of the row.
customer_reviews.author: bargain hunter

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to similar brands. Flavor is good. Tends to stick to your teeth so you'll need to brush the paste off again; but that's better then strips that don't have enough paste. Second time I've ordered this brand over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D Heskin

customer_reviews.title: Whitens great--but a bit messy!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these and the other leading white strips brand. These are very affective at whitening your teeth, but they are messy. They are not an advanced seal, and can slip around on your teeth. When you wear them, you're committed to 30 minutes of minimal talking, so that they don't move around or come off on the inner side of your teeth (from your tongue lifting it off). I'd say it's worth the money if you have the patience!!
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn L

customer_reviews.title: These were ok. Had a hard time getting them ...
customer_reviews.text: These were ok. Had a hard time getting them to stay in the right place. Have to mess with them the entire time they are on. Also at least 5 of the packs were dry. Ok Item. I didnt see much change in my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Product
customer_reviews.text: I am highly unsatisfied with this product. Generally the "Amazon Picks" have high quality at reasonable prices. I found this not to be the case. The whitening strips seldom stayed in place, especially the bottom strip, making them practically useless. In the future I will pay a couple extra dollars for a better product
customer_reviews.author: TOM MCCONKEY

customer_reviews.title: Tooth whiting strips
customer_reviews.text: It's too soon for me to decide the effect they are having on my teeth. I've been using them for about one week and will rate them soon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Dont work.
customer_reviews.text: Not good. They break apart while on teeth, and it's hard to get it all out of your mouth. They dont really work either. Probably gonna have to pay a little more for some better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strips
customer_reviews.text: we need to have long course to get the right result

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: They are ok the bottom strip is hard to get to stick and falls off easily. Also I was scared at first because the top left weird marks and you end up with a bunch of the gel collecting on the roof of your mouth but they do whiten your teeth ultimately just weren’t my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: heather christowski

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! They do not work at all and they will not stay on. You mine as well buy the Crest brand because buying this is just like throwing money in the trash!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging, but works great.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars, but issues with not being able to remove it without the product sticking. I have purchased a few times, and it's hit or miss on the packaging. They need better quality control. May try a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good results!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product, especially for the price - compared to other teeth whitening strips. The bottom strip is a bit hard to attach and slips around but overall happy and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, nasty, hard to peel. Definitely made with inferior ingredients. Felt like I was putting myself in harm.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: As far as whitening,Great!! If you can get them to stay on your teeth!! Maybe I should have spent the extra cash for the other brand 😕

customer_reviews.title: No sensitivity at all from these and they surprisingly stay on easy when you attach
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference after even the first time. Unfortunately, I didn't use all the strips consecutively. I skipped some days in between but I can tell my teeth are whiter. No sensitivity at all from these and they surprisingly stay on easy when you attach. There's really no mess associated with these strips.

customer_reviews.text: The gel hurt my gums when I put them on my teeth.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.

customer_reviews.text: Even though I have white teeth already, this actually made them a tad bit whiter. Easier than the blue light teeth whitening system I was using. Very pleased!👍

customer_reviews.text: Better than what I was using before. The flavor makes it easier to keep it on your teeth; while the other brands taste like chemicals this one taste like mint.

customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as any dentist treatment. Only slight irritation of the gums, but it doesn't really bother me personally. I would put it on during at 30 minute period where you don't have to talk much, because it's a little difficult with these on. There's a noticeable difference in my teeth, though.

customer_reviews.title: this product is good
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the middle of treatment and I think they are working relatively well. The only complaint that I have is that there is a thick layer of product on my teeth after each use. I have to wipe it off with a towel but for the price, this product is good enough

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to not spending as much on other brands

customer_reviews.title: This product is simple and easy to use and my teeth showed a marked effect ...

It is relatively inexpensive as well ,which is key when spending lots of dollars on medical care. Fantastic product and great value. Thank you much.

customer_reviews.title: it's safe to say these are strong and are probably NOT good for people with sensitive teeth

I'm not sure if they are damaging though...the fact that after only 1-30 minute treatment my teeth are this white, it's safe to say these are strong and are probably NOT good for people with sensitive teeth. However, I bought 2 packs and most likely won't be using the 2nd pack for a long time. Might give it away and buy more. The price of these strips are FANTASTIC.

customer_reviews.title: Better the Crest White Strips

They are whitening my teeth which is something (to be honest) I was not really expecting for the price. I will buy more of these in the future. In my opinion, they work better than Crest strips.

customer_reviews.title: I suggest that it be applied for longer than 1/2 hour for best affect. I usually put it on before I ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these on a regular basis. I suggest that it be applied for longer than 1/2 hour for best affect. I usually put it on before I leave for work and remove it at my desk. The film is so clear that most people don't even notice it on my teeth when talking.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of these and wouldn't recommend. Spend the extra cash and get crest whitestrips ...
customer_reviews.text: These kind of work. They leave some parts of my teeth whiter than others. There is the gunk that is left behind after you use it so you have to brush your teeth after. Not a fan of these and wouldn't recommend. Spend the extra cash and get crest whitestrips instead.

customer_reviews.title: I completley recommend doing that instead of buying whitening strips
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice much of a difference, i have however recently discovered brushing your teeth with activated charcoal. I completley recommend doing that instead of buying whitening strips. The whiteness you can achieve with activated charcoal is way better than any strips.

The strip is very, very thin which makes it harder to keep in place and it tends to disintegrate. But it is well worth the price and I would never go back to the expensive name-brand strips.

I would definitely buy again!

When you try to peel it off, some of the gel sticks to it more than the strip. So if you can get it started, it peels off well. It's the start that's rocky.

I'll try more until I run out but I have a feeling that will be in the next to three days.

product_meta.title: Sparkling White Professional Strength 6% HP Teeth Whitening Strips - Elastic Strips Plus Advanced Whitening Formula = Great Results! 28 Strips (14 Upper and 14 Lower) Free Teeth Shade Guide Included.
product_meta.description: Sparkling White Teeth Whitening Strips SIMPLE - SAFE - EFFECTIVE! GUARANTEED RESULTS....FAST! 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! 1- Keep the strips in a cool place. 2- Never handle them with wet hands. 3- Try to wipe your teeth with a napkin and dry your teeth before applying. 4- Do NOT use the strips immediately after brushing your teeth. It is better not to brush your teeth before whitening but you need to floss and rinse your teeth very good before whitening. You can brush lightly after whitening. Sealed foil package comes with 14 pouches of 2 strips (one for upper and one for lower teeth) Total of 28 strips, 2 weeks supply. Sparkling White teeth whitening strips are very easy to use. You can whiten your teeth in just 2 weeks. You do not need mouth trays or gels tubes or pens. These whitening strips are easy to apply. Sparkling White teeth whitening strips 100% enamel safe. Complete results in 14 days or we'll give your money back. The sealed box contains 14 mini aluminum pouches, each locking up the freshness of 2 strips. You will also get a free shade guide so you can see your progress. Please do not give up on the strips after the first session, you will start seeing results in a few days. Advanced teeth whitening strips are enamel safe. For longer lasting results, avoid staining food and drinks. Handle the strips only with dry hands. You should also dry your teeth with a towel-napkin - strips will stick much better. Step 1: Fit lower strip - apply gel side against your teeth and fold over the remainder to back of teeth. Step 2: Fit the upper strip. Step 3: Dispose the strips after 30 minutes (minimum 15 minutes). Clean your mouth carefully and clean the gel off your teeth. Store the strips in a cool/cold place. Refrigerate but do not freeze the strips. Keep them away from direct heat sources.
feature_bullets: Highest quality Teeth Whitening Strips. Advanced Formula Elastic Strips. You Get 14 Pouches of 1 Upper and 1 Bottom Teeth Whitening Strips. That's 28 Full Applications of our Teeth Whitening Formula on 28 Enamel-Safe Teeth Whitening Strips

Peel...Apply...Reveal Your Whiter and Brighter Smile. Sparkling White Smiles makes it so easy for you to get each and every tooth as white as possible. All you have to do is peel the white strips from it's packaging evenly apply your across your teeth and reveal your whiter and brighter smile after 30 minutes
